Key.English: Hey you! Over here!
But quiet! I think we are not alone!
You me promised safe get away!!
Where boat? Where helicopter? We all die!! Where boat????
We're the reconnaissance force and need your help and information! You have to cooperate!
Stay calm! We're here to protect you but we need your help.
Fuck you! No me help! No boat!
You protect? With what?
You little people here!
Soldier on Stratis much!! Much more than you!
Where boat!
The information Greek prick! Now! Or you find yourself eatin' the dirt!!
Stay here! We'll call our support immediatly.
No hurt... please no hurt.
Nothing left. Wife. Dog. Boat.
Support? Now? Please... call... I help!
Ok. Much soldiers at Maxwell! Much than you. You not go.
But big weapons at air station! Make soldiers dead! You go there!
I mark you map. Now boat. Me fear!
They Coming!!!! Hide!! HIDE!!!!!!
Help! Get out me! Help!
